headline.main: Italian Diplomat Appointed to Head U.N. Refugee Agency
headline.print_headline: Italian Diplomat Appointed to Head U.N. Refugee Agency

docs.snippet: Secretary-General Ban Ki-moon on Wednesday appointed Italian diplomat Filippo Grandi as the next head of the U.N. refugee agency, a position that Denmark's former Prime Minister Helle Thorning-Schmidt had been openly lobbying for....
docs.lead_paragraph: Secretary-General Ban Ki-moon on Wednesday appointed Italian diplomat Filippo Grandi as the next head of the U.N. refugee agency, a position that Denmark's former Prime Minister Helle Thorning-Schmidt had been openly lobbying for.

headline.main: Official: Anti-Islamic Police Training Class Inappropriate
headline.print_headline: Official: Anti-Islamic Police Training Class Inappropriate

docs.snippet: New Jersey officials say it was inappropriate for a county police academy to have a self-described former Muslim terrorist speak at a class called "Know Your Enemy."...
docs.lead_paragraph: New Jersey officials say it was inappropriate for a county police academy to have a self-described former Muslim terrorist speak at a class called "Know Your Enemy."

headline.main: Questions, Answers About Waco Biker Case Indictments
headline.print_headline: Questions, Answers About Waco Biker Case Indictments

docs.snippet: A grand jury has now returned indictments alleging that 106 bikers arrested after a deadly shootout outside a Waco, Texas, restaurant were engaged in organized criminal activity. Nine people died and 20 were injured during the May 17 shootout betw...
docs.lead_paragraph: A grand jury has now returned indictments alleging that 106 bikers arrested after a deadly shootout outside a Waco, Texas, restaurant were engaged in organized criminal activity. Nine people died and 20 were injured during the May 17 shootout between police and bikers outside a Twin Peaks restaurant, a conflict authorities say arose from an apparent confrontation between the Bandidos and the Cossacks motorcycle clubs.

headline.main: Yik Yak Social Media Service Can Reveal User Data to Police
headline.print_headline: Yik Yak Social Media Service Can Reveal User Data to Police

docs.snippet: Internet users of the Yik Yak social media app popular among college students aren't nearly as anonymous as they believe: Missouri police within hours arrested a student accused of threatening violence, the latest in a string of such arrests at co...
docs.lead_paragraph: Internet users of the Yik Yak social media app popular among college students aren't nearly as anonymous as they believe: Missouri police within hours arrested a student accused of threatening violence, the latest in a string of such arrests at colleges in recent months involving threats of mass violence posted online using the service.

headline.main: Apocalyptic landscapes lure tourists to Argentine ghost town
headline.sub: Apocalyptic landscapes lure tourists to Argentine ghost town

docs.snippet: Former residents walk amid the ruins of Epecuen 30, years after a flood submerged the one time resort town in water. Rough Cut- subtitled (no reporter narration)....
docs.lead_paragraph: Former residents walk amid the ruins of Epecuen 30, years after a flood submerged the one time resort town in water. Rough Cut- subtitled (no reporter narration).

headline.main: Native Americans Oppose Stripping Protection From Yellowstone Grizzlies
headline.print_headline: Native Americans Oppose Stripping Protection From Yellowstone Grizzlies

docs.snippet: Native American tribes on Wednesday called for the U.S. government to halt plans to strip grizzly bears in and around Yellowstone of Endangered Species Act protection because it would open the way for trophy hunting in Idaho and two other states b...
docs.lead_paragraph: Native American tribes on Wednesday called for the U.S. government to halt plans to strip grizzly bears in and around Yellowstone of Endangered Species Act protection because it would open the way for trophy hunting in Idaho and two other states bordering the national park.
